Elisa Koon

Name: Elisa Koon

Location: Canada

What About Me?

Just a girl who grew up in the suburbs, didn't have much to do but be creative and use things that were available. I would just make things when ideas come to me. Which brought me here now. I am currently a student interested in advertising and branding. I love being creative and solving problems.

Into:

Advertising, "Because they sell things that people don't want."
